select
from IC_TopupTransaction i
LEFT JOIN IC_TopupOrder o ON i.OrderNO = o.OrderNO LEFT JOIN SYS_User s ON o.ReviewID = s.ID LEFT JOIN BAR_Member b on b.id = o.UID
and i.CardAppNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR i.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%'
and i.TxnDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and i.TxnDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by TxnDateTime desc
Offset ${offset} Row Fetch Next ${limit} Rows Only

select count(*) from IC_TopupTransaction
LEFT JOIN IC_TopupOrder ON IC_TopupTransaction.OrderNO = IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO
and IC_TopupTransaction.CardAppNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupTransaction.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%'
and IC_TopupTransaction.TxnDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and IC_TopupTransaction.TxnDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'

update IC_TopupTransaction set IC_TopupTransaction.AuditStatus = #{auditvalue},IC_TopupTransaction.AuditUID = #{chkuserid},IC_TopupTransaction.AuditDateTime=getdate(), IC_TopupTransaction.AuditRemark=#{remark} where IC_TopupTransaction.ID=#{id}
